attributes.action: Remove Teresa May we are disappointed in her abilities we want Rees Mogg
attributes.additional_details: More money for schools,  infrastructure,  housing,  NHS, elderly care, disabled centres, the homeless, transport links the money she intends to do in a deal would go along way to increasing public secret wages and desperately needed retraining.
attributes.background: We want leave to mean leave no more money paid to the EU.  The money should be being spent in our economy not in the EU.  We need more funds for all our services.

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
